articles.author: ashley cowie
articles.title: Prehistoric Hunters Roasted and Ate Giant Snails 170000 Years Ago - Ancient Origins
articles.description: In a groundbreaking discovery, scientists have unearthed the remains of enormous snail shells at a 225,000-year-old archaeological site in southern Africa. What makes this find truly remarkable is that it appears these giant snails were not just natural inhab…
